Class DifferentialGeometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • mathematics.DifferentialGeometry

  • public class DifferentialGeometry
extends java.lang.Object
    Static library for handling the calculation of quantities from differential geometry

    Tristan

      static LayeredMatrix gaussianCurvature(ImageTTAA img)
      Computes an image with the Gaussian curvature values of each channel as the pixel values at every point.
